## Example slide
### Example subtitle

```{r}
#| label: tbl-model-fit
#| tbl-cap: "Example of a table caption"
#| echo: true

x    <- rnorm(n = 10, mean = 10, sd = 5)
y    <- x * runif(n = 10, min = 0, max = 1)

data <- data.frame(y = y, x = x)

fit  <- glm(formula = y ~ x, data = data)

broom::tidy(fit) |> kableExtra::kbl(align = "c", digits = 2)
```
